content: is there such a thing as  Yoga pose graph?

Yes, there are various resources available in the form of yoga pose graphs or charts. These graphs typically depict the different yoga poses along with their names and illustrations to help practitioners understand and practice the poses correctly. They can be found in yoga books, websites, yoga apps, or even in yoga studios, where they are often displayed on the walls as a reference for students. These graphs can be useful for beginners who are learning the poses or for individuals who want to deepen their yoga practice by exploring new poses.
